tasks.title: Find the neighbour's lost cat
tasks.description: Your neighbour has lost their brand new cat. Last seen at central park. Find their cat and bring it back to them.

intro: Help, please help! I've lost my dearest cat
Do you think you can find him?
details: I last saw him at the park
in_progress: Have you found my cat yet?
completed: Thank you so much! Here's a reward for your trouble
post_completion: Great day for a trip to the park!
My cat has been doing great lately

tasks.title: Chase neighbour's pests away
tasks.description: Your neighbour has rodents invading her apartment. Help them by scaring these pets away

intro: These damn rats keep chewing through my apartment walls!
I've laid traps but need help getting rid of them for good
details: You could come over and scare them right out the door
Once they know there's a dog around, they'll be too afraid to ever come back
completed: Lifesaver! Here's a little something to say thanks
post_completion: Can't remember the last time my apartment had only me for a tenant
It's nice to pour cereal for breakfast and not see some additional brown bits
